member.name: CERT_SELECT_CHAIN_PARA
member.summary: The CERT_SELECT_CHAIN_PARA structure contains the parameters used for building and selecting chains. This structure is used by the and functions.

member.name: CERT_SELECT_CHAIN_PARA.hChainEngine
member.summary: The handle of the chain engine to use to build the chain. If the value of the hChainEngine parameter is NULL, the default chain engine, HCCE_CURRENT_USER, is used.

summary.para: A pointer to a structure that contains the time for which the chain is to be validated. If the value of the pTime parameter is NULL, the current system time is passed to this parameter.
summary.div: Note The time does not affect trust list, revocation, or root store checking.

member.name: CERT_SELECT_CHAIN_PARA.hAdditionalStore
member.summary: The handle of any additional store to search for supporting certificates and certificate trust lists (CTLs). This parameter can be NULL if no additional store is to be searched.

member.name: CERT_SELECT_CHAIN_PARA.pChainPara
member.summary: A pointer to a structure that includes chain-building parameters.

summary.para: Flag values that indicate special processing during chain build.

listheader.description: Revocation checking only accesses cached URLs.
Use only cached URLs in building a certificate chain. The Internet and intranet are not searched for URL-based objects.
